file_insights.changes_summary: Added detailed documentation about deployment blockers for Cloudflare Pages

patterns_discovered: Cloudflare Pages deployment requires merging PR to main branch
GitHub Actions workflow triggers only on main/master push
Deployment preview URLs are created only after first successful deployment
gotchas_discovered: Cloudflare Pages project does not pre-exist before first deployment
GitHub secrets must be configured before deployment can succeed
Preview URL cannot be verified until PR is merged and workflow completes
recommendations: Verify GitHub secrets before attempting deployment
Create and merge pull request to trigger deployment workflow
Monitor GitHub Actions for successful deployment
Verify preview URL after workflow completion
